response.overview: Japan is thrown into a panic after several ships are sunk near Odo Island. An expedition to the island led by Dr. Kyohei Yamane soon discover something far more devastating than imagined in the form of a 50 meter tall monster whom the natives call Gojira. Now the monster begins a rampage that threatens to destroy not only Japan, but the rest of the world as well.
response.tagline: Godzilla, a weapon of science, a great battle of wonder and terror!
response.title: Godzilla

titles.title: Japón Bajo el Terror del Monstruo
怪獣ゴジラ
titles.type: Novelization based on Shiro Horie & Sango Nagase's radio drama, written by Shigeru Kayama (10/25/1954).

titles.title: Kaijū Gojira
titles.type: Novelization based on Shiro Horie & Sango Nagase's radio drama, written by Shigeru Kayama (10/25/1954). Romanized title.

titles.title: Monster Godzilla
titles.type: Novelization based on Shiro Horie & Sango Nagase's radio drama, written by Shigeru Kayama (10/25/1954). Translated title.

release_dates.note: TOHO Visual Entertainment 4K UHD / Blu-ray. Packaged with "Monster King Godzilla" (1957) (HD only).
The Criterion Collection DVD / Blu-ray release. Japanese w/EN subs. Packaged with "Godzilla, King of the Monsters!" (1956).
Classic Media Collector's Edition DVD. Japanese w/EN subs. Packaged with "Godzilla, King of the Monsters!" (1956).
The Criterion Collection Blu-ray set titled "Godzilla, the Showa-Era Films, 1954-1975". JP w/EN subs. Packaged with "Godzilla, King of the Monsters!" (1956) (same disc).
The Criterion Collection 4K UHD + Blu-ray. Japanese w/EN subs. Packaged with "Godzilla, King of the Monsters!" (1956) (HD only).
